doctors.name: Dr. Raman Jindal
doctors.education: MBBS, MS Orthopedics, Fellowship in Joint Replacement Surgery
doctors.description: Dr. Raman Jindal (MBBS, MS Orthopedics, Fellowship in Joint Replacement Surgery) is a highly experienced and trusted orthopedic doctor in Meerut, known for delivering advanced and compassionate orthopedic care. With years of expertise in fracture management, joint replacement, sports injury treatment, arthritis care, and minimally invasive orthopedic surgeries, Dr. Jindal is committed to restoring mobility and improving the quality of life for his patients. He practices at Sangeeta Ortho and Gynae Center, one of the leading orthopedic facilities in Meerut, equipped with modern diagnostic tools, advanced operation theaters, and a dedicated rehabilitation unit. Dr. Jindal’s patient-first approach, precise diagnosis, and customized treatment plans make him widely regarded as the best orthopedic doctor in Meerut.
legacy: Treated thousands of trauma and joint cases.
expertise: Sports Injury Treatment – ACL, PCL, Meniscus, Rotator Cuff
doctors.callToAction: Book your appointment with Dr. Raman Jindal today for expert orthopedic care and take the first step towards a pain-free life.

contactInfo.address: Sangeeta Ortho and Gynae Center, Meerut

doctors.name: Dr. Sangeeta Jindal
doctors.description: Dr. Sangeeta Jindal, founder and head consultant at Sangeeta Medical Centre, is a highly experienced obstetrician and gynecologist in Meerut with over 35 years of dedicated service in women’s healthcare. Known for her compassionate approach and deep medical expertise, she has guided thousands of women through safe pregnancies, successful deliveries, and advanced gynecological treatments.
legacy: 35+ years of dedication to women's health.
doctors.callToAction: Schedule your consultation with Dr. Sangeeta Jindal for personalized maternity care and the best gynecological and maternity care with warmth and professionalism.

doctors.name: Dr. Manisha Chaudhary
doctors.description: Dr. Manisha Chaudhary, M.S. (Obstetrics & Gynecology), is a highly respected gynecologist in Meerut with years of expertise in providing compassionate and advanced women’s healthcare. Known as one of the best gynecologists in Meerut, she specializes in normal and high-risk pregnancy care, infertility treatment, and laparoscopic gynecological surgeries.
expertise: Laparoscopic Surgeries (Hysterectomy, Myomectomy, Ovarian Cyst Removal)
doctors.callToAction: Contact Dr. Manisha Chaudhary for comprehensive women’s healthcare solutions and the highest standards of patient safety.
